slides.title: Tengizchevroil
slides.description: TCO is a Kazakhstan partnership engaged in the exploration, development, production and marketing of crude oil, liquefied petroleum gas, dry gas and sulfur.

slides.title: Karachaganak Petroleum Operating B.V.
slides.description: KPO B.V. is a consortium formed to implement the Karachaganak project on developing the pertroleum industry in Kazakhstan.

slides.title: North Caspian Operating Company N.V.
slides.description: NCOC N.V. is one of the largest companies delivering the offshore field development.

sixthBlock.description: Our company bases its activities on a balanced combination of the customers, employees, shareholders and community interests, while strictly complying with legal standards, introducing the latest technology and equipment, as well as following the HSE requirements.
